version_description:
OneMail is now more reliable than ever with our users feedback and features requests.
OneMail latest version includes performance improvements and some other bug fixes.
Fixed the red screen issue for some custom IMAP accounts.
Added Push Notifications to more IMAP providers.

OneMail is now more reliable than ever with our users feedback and features requests.
OneMail latest version includes performance improvements and some other bug fixes.
Fixed the red screen issue for some custom IMAP accounts.
Added Push Notifications to more IMAP providers.

OneMail latest update brings many new features, performance improvements and bug fixes.
Fixed an issue when sometimes adding a custom email account causes the app to exit to the home screen.
Added the account color indicator tag into the notification banner.
You can now reply to or archive an email from the notification banner.
Added Push Notifications to more IMAP providers.
Many more features to come...

OneMail latest update brings many new features, performance improvements and bug fixes.
Fixed an issue when sometimes adding a custom email account causes the app to exit to the home screen.
Fixed a bug when having a zero inbox prevent push notifications from coming.
Added Push Notifications to more IMAP providers.
Many more features to come...

OneMail latest update brings many new features, performance improvements and bug fixes.
Fixed an issue when sometimes adding a custom email account causes the app to exit to the home screen.
Fixed a bug when having a zero inbox prevent push notifications from coming.
Added Push Notifications to more IMAP providers.
Many more features to come...

OneMail latest update brings many new features, performance improvements and bug fixes.
Fixed an issue when sometimes adding a custom email account causes the app to exit to the home screen.
You can now display all sender emails by tapping on its address in the email content screen.
System accessibility can now control OneMail text size.
Added Push Notifications to more IMAP providers.
Many more features to come...

OneMail latest update brings many new features, performance improvements and bug fixes.
Fixed an issue when adding Yahoo! accounts.
